DESCRIPTION: As someone passionate about programming, I dedicate myself to my projects with enthusiasm, finding joy and satisfaction in my journey as a programmer. I am always working to improve my skills and pursue continuous professional growth.

course_analysis.name: Analysis and Systems Development
course_analysis.description: This is my current course, where I learn the fundamentals of systems analysis and development, combining theory and practice to design, build, and optimize software solutions.

course_web_dev.name: Web Developer
course_web_dev.title: Complete Front-end Course
course_web_dev.description: Specialized course covering everything from basic concepts to the most advanced web development techniques. I learned to work with JavaScript, PHP, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and MySQL, creating dynamic and interactive interfaces, implementing smooth animations, structuring projects in a modular and scalable manner, and ensuring code quality with automated testing. This course prepares you to build high-performance web applications.

course_angular.name: Angular
course_angular.title: Angular Course
course_angular.description: From basics to advanced, using animations, componentization, and unit tests with the Angular framework maintained by Google since 2016. It enables robust, scalable, and efficient web development.

course_typescript.name: Typescript
course_typescript.title: Typescript course
course_typescript.description: From fundamentals to advanced usage, TypeScript enhances JavaScript with static typing, interfaces, and modern features. Developed and maintained by Microsoft, it allows for scalable, error-resistant, and maintainable web development while improving collaboration across teams.

portfolio.testGameDesc: Responsive design implementation and UI/UX concepts for intuitive interaction on any screen size.
portfolio.bodyMassDesc: Design experiments using GSAP, CSS, and SVG. Simple logic implementation with JavaScript.
portfolio.productRegDesc: Demonstration of a layout for product registration using Angular.
